howItWorks.title: How AngoraSix works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple, transparent process that puts contributors in control

step1.title: Define the rules
step1.description: Start by establishing clear governance and compensation rules for your project. Everyone knows exactly how decisions are made and how contributions are rewarded from day one. Set up transparent processes that ensure fairness and accountability for all team members.
step1.imageAlt: Project governance and rules setup interface

step2.title: We track all contributions
step2.description: We integrate seamlessly with the tools you already use - Trello, Jira, Notion, Asana, and more. Every task, every commit, every contribution is automatically tracked and valued. No more guessing about who did what or how much value was created.
step2.imageAlt: Integration dashboard showing connected tools and tracked contributions

outcome1.title: Governance based on ownership
outcome1.description: Governance isn't symbolic. Everyone has a voice, but those who contribute more hold proportionally more decision-making power. Your impact determines your influence, creating a meritocratic system where the most dedicated contributors guide the project's direction.
outcome1.imageAlt: Decision-making dashboard showing voting power based on contributions

outcome2.title: Transparent payments via shared wallet
outcome2.description: All earnings are distributed securely and automatically through a shared multi-signature wallet. No delays, no disputes, no hidden fees - just fair, transparent compensation that reflects each member's actual contribution to the project's success.
outcome2.imageAlt: Financial dashboard showing transparent payment distribution
